pages.text: You can obtain Bamboo Charcoals from Japanese Timber Bamboo by smelting. Burning duration of Bamboo Charcoal is same as Coal and Charcoal. (8 items by Furnace)$(br2)It is more useful than Coal or Charcoal because you can easily gather Japanese Timber Bamboo.
A Bamboo Charcoal Block is from 9 pieces of Bamboo Charcoal, but like a Coal Block, it has the burning power of 10 pieces of Bamboo Charcoal, so it is more economical to burn it as a block.
